subject: Haptic motors didn’t come in
description_text: I ordered the Newest Simsonn Pedal Pro X Ultra with Haptics and RGB Feedback and it didn’t come with any haptic feedback motors the order number was #SSN5781

conversations.body_text: Hi Connor Doolittle,  We apologize for the delayed response; we've just returned from vacation. Here is your shipping tracking link. This product has been out of stock for nearly two weeks due to overwhelming demand. We'll ship it out within the next couple of days and sincerely apologize for the delay.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047224806503
